homePage.title: Next.js Starter Kit
homePage.subtitle: A modern, feature-rich template for Next.js 15 to save you hours of setup time. Includes TypeScript, TailwindCSS, i18n, and more.

features.title: Features
features.nextjs: With App Router for modern React applications and TypeScript for type safety and improved developer experience
features.tailwind: For utility-first styling and responsive design (using PostCSS plugin)
features.shadcn: For beautifully designed, accessible, and customizable components
features.multilanguage: With English and Arabic (LTR and RTL layouts configurable), config stored in cookies. Using next-intl package
features.accessibility: With WCAG 2.1 standards, including screen reader support, keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, and localized accessibility labels
features.contactForm: With Zod validation and Resend email integration
features.notifications: Using Sonner for user feedback (e.g., after form submission)

metadata.siteDescription: A modern, fast, and SEO-optimized Next.js starter kit with internationalization support.
